Parma.Lakeview Terrace (Cleveland): The Lakeview Terrace Apartments is a set of row houses, apartments, and a high-rise residential building in the Ohio City neighborhood of Cleveland that was started in 1935 and culminated in the opening of the 1973 high-rise apartment tower. The apartment tower is 208 feet tall and contains 19 stories. The complex is notable for being one of the first public housing projects in the country.
